snippet.title: The Tides of Time - Release Trailer - a time-loop ARPG
snippet.description:
Hey guys, i am solo game developer from Germany and this is my first big project. The Tides of Time is an Action-Adventure-RPG with a time-loop mechanic..

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1452360/The_Tides_of_Time/?beta=0

Discord: https://discord.gg/zpgKHaYN8h
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ohanagamestudio/?igshid=ig2vnxbmyvqy
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GameOhana?s=09
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ohanastudio

Song: Arcane Trailer by John Leonard French
https://johnleonardfrench.com/
